keyMoments.title: Surume the Kraken's Debut
keyMoments.description: Surume appears as a massive Kraken blocking the Straw Hats' underwater path, initially appearing as a fearsome obstacle.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the Kraken, who will later become an ally of the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Kraken Destroys Caribou Pirates' Ship
keyMoments.description: Surume effortlessly destroys the Caribou Pirates' ship with a single tentacle strike, demonstrating his immense power.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Kraken as an incredibly powerful creature capable of crushing ships with ease.

reveals.information: Kraken - a colossal sea monster with at least 18 tentacles
300 meters tall, capable of crushing ships effortlessly

keyMoments.title: Caribou Orders Attack on Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Caribou commands his crew to attack and board the Thousand Sunny while underwater.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Caribou's initial confidence before being humbled by the Straw Hats' power.

keyMoments.title: Caribou Captured by the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: After being abandoned by his crew and Momoo, Caribou begs for mercy and is captured by the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Caribou becomes a prisoner on the Thousand Sunny, setting up his continued presence in the arc.
keyMoments.quote: Please don't throw me into the sea!

reveals.information: Cowardly when faced with superior power, begs for mercy when alone

keyMoments.title: Momoo Recognizes the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Momoo appears pulling the Caribou Pirates' crew but immediately recognizes Nami, Sanji, and Luffy from Arlong Park and flees in fear.
keyMoments.significance: Callbacks to the Arlong Park arc and shows the lasting impact of the Straw Hats' earlier adventures.

reveals.information: Momoo is now in the waters near Fish-Man Island, far from Arlong Park

relationships.description: Momoo is terrified of Nami from their encounter at Arlong Park.

evolutionMoments.description: Momoo immediately flees upon recognizing Nami, showing his fear remains.

relationships.description: Momoo is terrified of Luffy from their encounter at Arlong Park.

evolutionMoments.description: Momoo immediately flees upon recognizing Luffy.

relationships.description: Momoo is terrified of Sanji from their encounter at Arlong Park.

evolutionMoments.description: Momoo immediately flees upon recognizing Sanji.

keyMoments.title: Robin's Mil Fleur: Gigantesco Mano Debut
keyMoments.description: Robin demonstrates her new post-timeskip technique, creating a massive hand that protects the Thousand Sunny from a boulder.
keyMoments.significance: First major display of Robin's enhanced abilities after her two-year training, showcasing significant growth in her Devil Fruit mastery.

abilities.description: Robin creates a thousand bloomed arms that form into two giant limbs, capable of tremendous physical power.

reveals.information: Learned to create giant limbs using her Hana Hana no Mi during two-year training

keyMoments.title: Luffy Decides to Tame the Kraken
keyMoments.description: Luffy decides to tame the Kraken rather than simply defeat it, showing his characteristic optimism.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the eventual taming of Surume and demonstrates Luffy's unique leadership approach.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Prepares Gear Third
keyMoments.description: Luffy prepares to activate Gear Third to fight the Kraken underwater.
keyMoments.significance: Teases Luffy's improved Gear Third technique post-timeskip.

keyMoments.title: Franky Demonstrates New Rocket Launchers
keyMoments.description: Franky reveals his post-timeskip upgrades by using new rocket launchers to defend against the Kraken.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Franky's enhanced weaponry after his two-year upgrade with Vegapunk's technology.

abilities.description: Franky's new built-in rocket launchers for ship defense.

reveals.information: Upgraded himself with new rocket launcher weaponry during two-year timeskip

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Chopper Uses Guard Point Underwater
keyMoments.description: Chopper transforms into Guard Point to protect the Thousand Sunny from the Kraken's attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's improved control over his Rumble Ball forms after training.

reveals.information: Improved mastery of Zoan transformations, can use Guard Point more effectively
